primary.context: Customer wanted to pay a balance of $1,484.81 via credit card
primary.detail: The AI successfully identified the account and balance but failed to send the payment link due to a technical error, resulting in a transfer to concierge.

steps: Customer requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent collected name and state for verification.
Agent retrieved account balance and contract details.
Agent confirmed contact information for link delivery.
Agent encountered a technical error while attempting to send the link.
Agent transferred the caller to the concierge queue.

failure.detail: The agent encountered an error while attempting to send the payment link after successful verification and account lookup.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for spelling of name

actions.detail: Looked up account for Paul Markowitz
Verified identity using name and state
System error occurred during link generation/send
Transferred to concierge after technical failure

insights.summary: The customer called to pay maintenance fees and provided all necessary verification info. The AI successfully found the $1,484.81 balance but failed to send the payment link due to a technical issue, leading to a transfer.
insights.verbatim: I would like to pay my maintenance fees with a credit card.
insights.coaching: The agent performed well until the technical failure; ensure API stability for link delivery to prevent high-effort transfers for in-scope tasks.
